publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-916.1# Alasdair Morgan: Fuel Prices in Rural Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-916) in the name of Alex Fergusson, insert at end "but recognises that the major concern for all of Scotland remains the high price of fuel generally, which results from the legacy of the fuel duty escalator introduced by the previous Conservative UK government and exacerbated by the actions of the current Labour government."

S2M-916.1# Alasdair Morgan: Fuel Prices in Rural Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-916) in the name of Alex Fergusson, insert at end "but recognises that the major concern for all of Scotland remains the high price of fuel generally, which results from the legacy of the fuel duty escalator introduced by the previous Conservative UK government and exacerbated by the actions of the current Labour government."
